title: Do you miss anyone? If so, how do you cope with it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I miss my father so much. He left us three years before. Without him we feel very alone. After his death we come to know about the cruel nature of society. When he was alive people came to our place but now people behave like we are invisible to them. But my father made us so strong that we can fight all circumstances. So thanks to my father.
